packagegui.name: tailscale_auth
packagegui.title: VPN/Tailscale

field.description: Use a non-reusable auth key and disable key expiry for trusted machines via the provider admin console.
Disconnect local machine from login server (if connected), expire the current log in, and flush the local state cache.

packagegui.note: Changes to these settings may temporarily disrupt peer connections and access to Tailscale.
